title: Evaluating Large-Scale Asset Purchases
content: For release on delivery  10:00 a.m. EDT  October 11, 2012      Evaluating Large-Scale Asset Purchases         Remarks by     Jeremy C. Stein     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     The Brookings Institution     Washington, D.C.                 October 11, 2012
